CustomField.description: Must match Account Franchisor value. Before creating a CAGR, check to see if there is an applicable Custom VAGR. If not, then use the standard rule associated with the Product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Must match Account Franchisor value. Before creating a CAGR, check to see if there is an applicable Custom VAGR. If not, then use the standard rule associated with the Product.
CustomField.label: Franchisor
